title: Flight plan
creator_credit: Stanley Hawes and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The organisation of ciial aviation in Australia; the planning and control behind, and during, every flight; the training of pilots and maintenance staff; plans for the future development of the service. Also features the Royal Flying Doctor Service.
